Detailed Description

Base class for widgets that provide an interface for DzProperty types.

Base class for all widgets that allow the user to view/edit the current value of a DzProperty-derived class.

DzError DzPropertyWgt::addProperty ( DzProperty *  prop  )  [virtual]

Add a property to track.

Parameters:
prop The property to add to the list of properties controlled by this widget.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR if the property was successfully added to the list of properties for the widget, otherwise, an error code.

void DzPropertyWgt::resetProperties ( bool  allowUndo = false  )  [virtual]

Resets all properties driven by this widget by deleting all keys on the property.

Parameters:
allowUndo If true then this method will create an undo item so it can be undone from the edit menu

void DzPropertyWgt::showControlOnly ( bool  onOff  )  [virtual]

Sets whether or not the widget should draw only its main control.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the widget will only draw its main control, otherwise, the widget will also draw its label.

Sets whether or not the widget's label, frame, etc are drawn - or only the control.
